title: Anything else you want to tell the tribunal
subtitle: You can tell the tribunal about anything you think may be relevant to your appeal, such as something you feel DWP didn’t consider in their assessment.
subtitleIba: You can tell the tribunal about anything you think may be relevant to your appeal, such as something you feel IBCA didn’t consider in their decision.
additonalInfo: You don’t have to write anything, if you have nothing further to add.
